{"step_by_step_thinking": "Choriocarcinoma is a type of cancer that occurs in the cells of the placenta, and it is known to metastasize or spread to other parts of the body. According to the World Health Organization and International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics staging system for choriocarcinoma, lung metastasis occurs in a specific stage. I need to find this information in the provided documents.
